wordGroup: enzyme engineering [生]酶工程；[生]酶工程学
enzyme linked immunosorbent assay 酶联免疫吸附测定，酶标法
restriction enzyme 限制性内切酶；限制酶
proteolytic enzyme 蛋白酶；蛋白水解酶；解朊酶

sentences.en: The scientists are cautious about using enzyme therapy on humans.
sentences.cn: 科学家们对于人体使用酶疗法持谨慎态度。

sentences.en: The natural enzyme is harmful to humans and animals.
sentences.cn: 天然酶对人和动物都是有害的。

sentences.en: This whole conversion process relies on a particular enzyme.
sentences.cn: 这整个转化过程依赖于一种特殊的酶。
